data.text: I recently dined at central restaurant and wanted to express my appreciation  for the exceptional customer service I received, from Saw the interaction with him was exemplary.I enjoyed the beef burger he recommended and the food portion was also good.
data.title: EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Pioneer41474860723,

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent dining experience at our Central Restaurant. We are delighted to hear that you received exceptional customer service from Saw and that his interaction with you was exemplary.

It is wonderful to know that you enjoyed the beef burger that Saw recommended and that you found the portion size to be satisfactory. We will be sure to pass along your appreciation to Saw and the rest of our team at Central Restaurant.

We strive to provide all of our guests with memorable experiences, and we are thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations during your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable dining experience at our establishment.

Warm regards,

Ismail Khadouch
Front Office Manager
ME Dubai
owner_response.author: Ismail khadouch

data.title: Perfect breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rainer F,

Thank you for sharing your experience of your recent stay at ME Dubai. We are thrilled to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our perfect breakfast experience at the Central restaurant.

It is wonderful to hear that Josephine provided you with great service and greeted you with a wonderful smile. We will make sure to pass along your kind words to Josephine and acknowledge her exceptional service.

We are delighted to hear that you looked forward to having your breakfast at our Central restaurant every day and that you found the design of the lobby hall to be spectacular and conducive to working comfortably during the day. 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to welcome you back for another memorable experience at ME Dubai in the future.

Warm regards,

Ismail Khadouch
Front Office Manager
ME Dubai
owner_response.author: Ismail khadouch

data.text: It was the best experience ever! Hotel is modern and exquisite. Moreover, there were so many delicious restaurants inside. Also the stuff was very friendly especially Marian, she has made our stay in the hotel so comfortable. She has resolved all of our problems and questions quickly and efficiently. Thank you so much Marian!!!
data.title: The best stay so far!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Uljana,

Thank you for your fantastic review! We are thrilled to hear that you had the best experience during your stay with us. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the modern and exquisite design of the hotel, as well as the delicious restaurants. We are so glad that Marian was able to make your stay comfortable and resolve any issues efficiently. We will make sure to pass along your kind words to her. We hope to welcome you back for another amazing stay in the future!

Warm Regards,

Ismail Khadouch
Front Office Manager
ME Dubai
owner_response.author: Ismail khadouch

data.text: Had the best massage - thanks to Eugene and Puspa, they will give you a hotel tour. Nice pool relaxing view, wew! Checked the hotel and it has amazing modern design. The staff are accommodating from the reception to the spa. I like the paintings.
data.title: The best massage

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jogieb882,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the massage from Eugene and Puspa, as well as the hotel tour. It is great to hear that you found the pool relaxing and enjoyed the modern design of the hotel. We will be sure to pass along your kind words to our staff. We hope to welcome you back for another relaxing stay soon.

Warm Regards,

Ismail Khadouch
Front Office Manager
ME Dubai
owner_response.author: Ismail khadouch

data.text:
Very accessible to metro if by commute during traffic hours. Walking about 10-15 mins.

I like the ambience when you enter the room. Eugene is amazing for giving usefull information. I like how Puspa do the massage. It lessens my shoulder pain. Good job.
Will recommended to family and friends.

Thank you.
data.title: Best massage experienced in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear ninavB8580XS,

Thank you for your positive review. We appreciate your kind words about our convenient location, welcoming ambiance, and exceptional service. We're delighted to hear that Eugene and Puspa exceeded your expectations.
We're honored by your recommendation to your family and friends. Your feedback encourages us to maintain our high standards.

Thank you for your valuable review, and we look forward to serving you again soon.

Warm regards,

Ismail Khadouch
Front Office Manager
ME Dubai
owner_response.author: Ismail khadouch
